name: Dodge Square (SixGamesEntertainment)
description:
This a game where you are a blue square dodging grey platforms.
if you like squares you are going to love this game
because this game is all squares!

How to Play:
Press the damage and heal buttons to move up and down respectively
Ovoid the platforms and collect points

Download instructions:
Step 1 Download the game zip
Step 2 Unzip the game
Step 3 Open the exe

Can you beat your highscore?
